page.title: 09KIPPEN PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is halfway up the Main Street in the middle of Kippen and has a main building and two mobile classrooms. At the moment we have 5 teachers:-Mrs.Lindsay the headteacher Mrs Berry-Pr.6&7,Miss Patrick-Pr.4&5, Miss Dunn-Pr.3&4 and Mrs Gordon-Pr.1&2 We also have visiting teachers for music,violin,sewing, P.E.,and a remedial teacher.We have 2 small play- grounds and 2 sloping grass areas for football and games.In the summer we play in a football and netball league with five other village schools in our area.We have four recorder groups of different abilities,two chanter players and Scottish country dancers trained by Mrs. Berry.We have a very active Parent's Association who hold an annual Wine and Cheese evening (amongst other things)to raise funds for the school.
